Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.lex.interactionkit.internal.audio.encoder

Interface AudioEncoder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedAudioEncoder, L16PcmEncoder
    public interface AudioEncoder
extends java.io.Closeable
    Interface for AudioEncoders.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        byte[] encode​(short[] samples,
              int numSamples)
       throws AudioEncoderException
        Encode PCM samples to compressed audio bytes.
        Parameters:
        samples - the samples to compress.
        numSamples - the number of samples int the buffer to compress.
        Returns:
        the compressed audio bytes.
        Throws:
        AudioEncoderException - when there's an error encoding the audio.

      • getPacketSize

        int getPacketSize()
